item.title: Wireless Penetration
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description: Posted without comment (no pun intended) Don’t try this at home, kids! Random Musing: this could probably be done on a Pi or similar. Inside Jokers’ Lair Boot Kali Light As of 2019.03: apt-get update && apt-get -y upgrade && \ apt-get install -y gcc git make \ libcurl4-openssl-dev libssl-dev zlib1g-dev git clone https://github.com/ZerBea/hcxdumptool && \ cd hcxdumptool && make install # run for 30 secs to confirm capabilities
